QuestData.Title: Meet the Cap'n
QuestData.Description: Alright, $p, I got another job for ya.$B$BYou see that lion seal in the pen over there? Name's Dog. He's been Soggy's pet for years.$B$BDog's acting up lately - I think he's getting restless in that pen. Why don't you go talk to Soggy and let him know.$B$BI'd say it's about time you meet the cap'n anyway.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with "Soggy" Su-Dao in Soggy's Gamble.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with "Soggy" Su-Dao in Soggy's Gamble.
QuestData.RewardText: New deckhand, eh? We'll see about that.$B$BI run a tight ship - even if she IS at the bottom of the sea.
